title: UMass Dining Engine
details: AI meal recommender that ingests live dining hall menus and filters for dietary preferences, helping 30k+ students decide meals faster.
stack: Java · Spring Boot · React · PostgreSQL · Redis · Python

title: Poker Trainer
details: Texas Hold’em practice environment with Monte Carlo opponents and WebAssembly simulations to teach pot odds and EV.

title: Medical Insight Bot
details: RAG chatbot built with FastAPI and pgvector to rank diagnoses from a medical knowledge base while comparing GPT-4o vs. Gemini outputs.

title: Subscription Tracker
details: Manager that tracks recurring costs, aggregates monthly/yearly totals, and alerts for expiring trials via a Javalin API.
